_header: Three kings on the twelfth day
_description: James Ryman, an Epiphany carol — eight macaronic six-line stanzas (ababcc) with refrain, ‘Ex illibata virgine’ and burden: ‘Ortus est sol iusticie / Ex illibata virgine’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Thre kingis on the XIIth dayestella micante
                    preuia…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Hym worship we now borne so freEx illibata
                    virgine
